title: Drawing, "Study: Peonies", early 20th century
medium: Pen and ink, graphite, brush and watercolor on yellow tracing paper
inscribed: recto: S. L. Crownfield (inscribed by her sister, Gertrude) / No. 3
creditline: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
description: Horizontal sheet depicting three studies of peonies at top (tinted with color) and bottom (not colored).
